Donate a Mask.description: Free delivery of N95 masks and/or COVID rapid tests to individuals, familes, and organizations across Canada

All the Walls Will Fall.description: 2023 Palestinian liberation resource list [curated by the Palestinian Youth Movement]

Ontario Trans I.D. resources.description: Documents and resources I've personally collected and curated for changing your name and/or gender marker with governmental bodies and services in Ontario

Justice Trans.description: Justice & legal info for Two Spirit, trans, non-binary, and gender non-conforming communities across Canada

Anti-Trans Legislative Risk Map.description: Resource tracking the risk levels of anti-trans legislation and policy in Canadian provinces and territories [maintained by Celeste Trianon]

Transfeminine Science.description: Informational content on transfeminine hormone therapy

Digital Transgender Archive.description: Archive of digitized and born-digital materials relating to the history of trans people

No Homeless Evictions petition.description: Petition to Toronto Mayor Olivia Chow to place a full moratorium on evictions of unhoused people [sponsored by Voices for Unhoused Liberation, Nov 2023]

Toronto Community Defence Fund for Pales.description: Fund for activists in Toronto working for Palestinian justice, to support with legal fees and other expenses [sponsored by Showing Up for Racial Justice (SURJ) Toronto]

National Network of Abortion Funds.description: Network of 100 independent abortion funds working to remove financial and logistical barriers to abortion access

No Tech for Apartheid petition.description: Petition to Amazon & Google to stop supporting the genocide of Palestinians in Gaza [Nov 2023]

House of Commons petition e-4731.description: Petition to the Government of Canada to immediately create direct pathways for emergency travel of Palestinians to Canada [closes Jan 14, 2024]

House of Commons petition e-4667.description: Petition to the Government of Canada to budget the necessary funds for the Canada Disability Benefit into the federal expenditures [closes Feb 1, 2024]

House of Commons petition e-4745.description: Petition to the Government of Canada to impose a two-way embargo on arms between Canada and Israel [closes Feb 19, 2024]

House of Commons petition e-4666.description: Petition to the Government of Canada to implement the recommendations from the White Paper on the Status of Trans and Gender Diverse People [closes Mar 7, 2024]
